titles.title: Stop the Killing in Syria Act
Stop the Killing in Syria Act
To impose additional sanctions with respect to Syria, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committees on Financial Services, and Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
